name: Isle Clash
description:
1. THRILLING MOBA AND STRATEGY GAME EXPERIENCE


■Move your hero freely on battleground with a virtual joystick, cast powerful spells and summon minions!
■Slain opponent’s hero and destroy their isle base to win the game.

2. FREE TO PLAY NOT PAY TO WIN


The battle is totally fair, there is no card training or paying for stats, the result of the game is decided based on your skill and deck build. You can purchase for skins and other ornaments if you like, but not advantage of gameplay.

3. UNLOCK HEROES AND SKINS FOR FREE


■Smash rival‘s isle to earn Anchor Stone and collect tons of hero skins and items.
■Play matches and complete quests to level up your ISLEPASS and earn various rewards.
■Climb the leaderboard to collect exclusive season rewards, the higher you climb the more you gain.

4. BUILD YOUR OWN CARD DECK


■Choose from various heroes with different abilities and spells, each hero has an exclusive card deck.
■Build your own card deck with 90+ class and neutral cards, each card has its own function and ability.
■Play matches to level up your heroes and unlock more powerful cards.

5. CONSTANTLY UPDATE


■More heroes and cards are constantly being released!
■1v2 battle and more casual game modes will come out soon.
■New ISLEPASS will be released every month with new challenging quests and unlimited rewards.

6. FAST-PACED GAMEPLAY


■Matchmaking takes less than 30 seconds, and battles last 3 minutes.

Feature List


■1v1 Ranked
■1v2 Casual Mode (Coming soon!)
■5 Heroes (More coming soon!)
■90+ spells and minions (More coming soon!)
■Monthly updated ISLEPASS
■Well-designed hero and minion skins
■Collect and send emotes to your opponents
■Fair game and collect skins for free
■Daily quests, weekly quests and season quests
■Custom arena skins
■Season rankings!
■Quick match and fast-paced battle
■Unique art style and high-quality voice acting
■Optimized PC control and interface, customizable hotkeys
